parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: FieldName
parameters.description:
The name of the field that is used for the query. Valid values:

*   **repoName**: the name of the image repository
*   **repoNamespace**: the namespace to which the image repository belongs

>  This parameter takes effect only when the **OperateType** parameter is set to **other**.

parameters.name: FieldValue
parameters.description:
The value of the field that is used for the query.

>  This parameter takes effect only when the **OperateType** parameter is set to **other**.

parameters.name: OperateType
parameters.description:
The type of the operation. Valid values:

*   **count**: counts statistics
*   **other**: others

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository.

parameters.name: RepoNamespace
parameters.description: The namespace to which the image repository belongs.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
The condition by which the feature is applied. Valid values:

*   **image_repo**: the ID of the image repository

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the feature. Valid values:

*   **image_repo**: image repository protection
